Name: Sweep
About the game: History. Go through the path of a desperate man who got into a criminal peripeteia and can only go to drastic measures to achieve his own results. Learn about the lives of ordinary people and people related to the criminal business in Russia in the 90s. Sweeper's difficulties. You will have to think carefully about your actions while completing job, because if you make even one mistake, you will have to start from the beginning. You are given complete freedom of action, do what you want and pass in any style, the main thing is to get rid of everyone. Use your abilities. Before starting a new task, you can choose which ability or starting equipment you will go with. You will have to think about your choice based on the information provided, your own intuition, and your preferred fighting style. RTX support. The game includes ray tracing support from NVidia. If you have a RTX series graphics card, you will be able to play with ray tracing. If not, you can still play but without ray tracing. Enjoy the music. The soundtrack for the game was written by electronic music composer Fly5olo . He wrote all the tracks in his signature and unique style. If you are a fan of such genres of music as: techno, drum&bass Ð¸ dubstep then you gonna like the soundtrack to this game.
